PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3atrueDisablefalse8154f49f-1e46-4d10-8e85-94c09fed12fbParse ResponseSystem.Xml.XmlDocument xDoc = context.Data.ToXmlDocument(); if (xDoc.DocumentElement.FirstChild.InnerText.ToString() == "DesignNotFound") { context.Properties["checkMaterialMasterResult"] = "False"; } else { string currentFacility = xDoc.DocumentElement.FirstChild.InnerText.ToString(); context.Instance.TraceInformation("facility name :" + currentFacility); if (context.EnvironmentVariables["PVFacilityFilter"].Length < 1){ throw new System.Exception("Environment variable PVFacilityFilter is not set or is empty. Please ensure that the variable is properly set before retrying."); } string pvFacilityFilter = context.EnvironmentVariables["PVFacilityFilter"].ToString().ToUpper(); string[] pvFacilityFilterList = pvFacilityFilter.Split(';'); foreach (var facility in pvFacilityFilterList) { var trimmedValue = facility.Trim(); if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(trimmedValue) && trimmedValue == currentFacility.ToUpper().Trim()) { context.Instance.TraceInformation("Facility Found."); context.Properties["checkMaterialMasterResult"] = "True"; } } } context.Instance.TraceInformation("Final Bool Value for PVFacilityFilter :" + context.Properties["checkMaterialMasterResult"].ToString());NeuronNeuron.PipelinesNeuron.EsbSystem, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089System.Core, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089System.Xml, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089System.Xml.Linq, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089System.Data, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089System.Data.DataSetExtensions, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089System.Runtime.Serialization, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089System.ServiceModel, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089Newtonsoft.Json, Version=12.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=30ad4fe6b2a6aeedMicrosoft.CSharp, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3aType4e47b057d804d06bb2bae64fb269c2Disablefalsefalsea0e661a3-269a-44ad-b56f-237a2adefc24ElseDisablefalse8447f7ba-53b7-4c89-87c7-894cb9a74d1bGroup
